text.jpText:
『日本ダービー』翌日。トウカイテイオーは
強いウマ娘が勝利すると言われる『菊花賞』
に向けて必死にトレーニングを積んでいた。
text.enText:
The day after the Japan Derby. Tokai Teio was 
training hard for the "Kikka-sho," which is 
said to be won by the strongest horsema girl. 
The day after the "Japan Derby," Tokai Teio 
was training hard for the

text.jpText:
だが無理を積み重ねた結果、彼女は脚を
痛めてしまい、この状態では『菊花賞』への
出走は難しいと宣言されてしまう。
text.enText:
However, as a result of her repeated 
overworking, she suffered a leg injury, and 
it was declared that she would not be able to 
run in the She was declared to be unable to 
run in the "Kikka-sho" in this condition.

text.jpText:
しかし彼女は、無理をしてでも
トレーニングを続け、『菊花賞』に
出走するのだと、断固とした意志を見せる。
text.enText:
However, she is determined to continue 
her training and run in the She is 
determined to continue her training 
and run in the "Kikka-sho.

text.jpText:
トレーナーはそんな彼女の熱意にほだされ、
様々な治療方を調べ、実行し、
どうにか回復させたのだった。
text.enText:
The trainer, buoyed by her enthusiasm, 
researched and implemented various treatment 
methods. She somehow managed to recover.
